loaf of bread is to run under water before baking it in the oven. Use the water to rehydrate the breads crumb, or interior. Then turn your oven on to a warm temperature - around 150 degrees - and stick the bread inside.

herpes is highly contagious and spreads from one person to another via skin-to-skin contact. It is commonly passed on through sex and oral sex. Once a person is infected with the virus it can reactivate every so often to cause a new episode of painful genital herpes.

smoking affects plants too, which can take up nicotine from contaminated soil and plumes of smoke. Researchers from Technical University of Braunschweig, Germany, analysed soil mulched with cigarette tobacco for more than nine days.
